verses.verse: Now after <WH310> the death <WH4194> of Mosheh <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of the YY <WH3068> it came to pass, that the YY <WH3068> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, Mosheh <WH4872> ' minister <WH8334> <WH8764>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Mosheh <WH4872> my servant <WH5650> is dead <WH4191> <WH8804>; now therefore arise <WH6965> <WH8798>, go over <WH5674> <WH8798> this Yarden <WH3383>, thou, and all this people <WH5971>, unto the land <WH776> which I do give <WH5414> <WH8802> to them, even to the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
Havahry place <WH4725> that the sole <WH3709> of your foot <WH7272> shall tread upon <WH1869> <WH8799>, that have I given <WH5414> <WH8804> unto you, as I said <WH1696> <WH8765> unto Mosheh <WH4872>.

From the wilderness <WH4057> and this Lebanon <WH3844> even unto the great <WH1419> river <WH5104>, the river <WH5104> Euphrates <WH6578>, all the land <WH776> of the Hittites <WH2850>, and unto the great <WH1419> sea <WH3220> toward the going down <WH3996> of the sun <WH8121>, shall be your coast <WH1366>.

There shall not any man <WH376> be able to stand <WH3320> <WH8691> before <WH6440> thee all the days <WH3117> of thy life <WH2416>: as I was with Mosheh <WH4872>, so I will be with thee: I will not fail <WH7503> <WH8686> thee, nor forsake <WH5800> <WH8799> thee.

Be strong <WH2388> <WH8798> and of a good courage <WH553> <WH8798>: for unto this people <WH5971> shalt thou divide for an inheritance <WH5157> <WH8686> the land <WH776>, which I sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto their fathers <WH1> to give <WH5414> <WH8800> them.

Only be thou strong <WH2388> <WH8798> and very <WH3966> courageous <WH553> <WH8798>, that thou mayest observe <WH8104> <WH8800> to do <WH6213> <WH8800> according to all the Torah <WH8451>, which Mosheh <WH4872> my servant <WH5650> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> thee: turn <WH5493> <WH8799> not from it to the right hand <WH3225> or to the left <WH8040>, that thou mayest prosper <WH7919> <WH8686> whithersoever thou goest <WH3212> <WH8799>.

This book <WH5612> of the Torah <WH8451> shall not depart <WH4185> <WH8799> out of thy mouth <WH6310>; but thou shalt meditate <WH1897> <WH8804> therein day <WH3119> and night <WH3915>, that thou mayest observe <WH8104> <WH8799> to do <WH6213> <WH8800> according to all that is written <WH3789> <WH8803> therein: for then thou shalt make <WH6743> thy way <WH1870> prosperous <WH6743> <WH8686>, and then thou shalt have good success <WH7919> <WH8686>.

Have not I commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> thee? Be strong <WH2388> <WH8798> and of a good courage <WH553> <WH8798>; be not afraid <WH6206> <WH8799>, neither be thou dismayed <WH2865> <WH8735>: for the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> is with thee whithersoever thou goest <WH3212> <WH8799>.
Then Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> commanded <WH6680> <WH8762> the officers <WH7860> <WH8802> of the people <WH5971>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Pass <WH5674> <WH8798> through <WH7130> the host <WH4264>, and command <WH6680> <WH8761> the people <WH5971>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Prepare <WH3559> <WH8685> you victuals <WH6720>; for within three <WH7969> days <WH3117> ye shall pass over <WH5674> <WH8802> this Yarden <WH3383>, to go in <WH935> <WH8800> to possess <WH3423> <WH8800> the land <WH776>, which the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430> giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> you to possess <WH3423> <WH8800> it.
And to the Re'uvenites <WH7206>, and to the Gadites <WH1425>, and to half <WH2677> the tribe <WH7626> of M'nasheh <WH4519>, spake <WH559> <WH8804> Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Remember <WH2142> <WH8800> the word <WH1697> which Mosheh <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> you, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, The YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430> hath given you rest <WH5117> <WH8688>, and hath given <WH5414> <WH8804> you this land <WH776>.

Your wives <WH802>, your little ones <WH2945>, and your cattle <WH4735>, shall remain <WH3427> <WH8799> in the land <WH776> which Mosheh <WH4872> gave <WH5414> <WH8804> you on this side <WH5676> Yarden <WH3383>; but ye shall pass <WH5674> <WH8799> before <WH6440> your brethren <WH251> armed <WH2571>, all the mighty <WH1368> men of valour <WH2428>, and help <WH5826> <WH8804> them;

Until the YY <WH3068> have given <WH5117> your brethren <WH251> rest <WH5117> <WH8686>, as he hath given you, and they also have possessed <WH3423> <WH8804> the land <WH776> which the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430> giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> them: then ye shall return <WH7725> <WH8804> unto the land <WH776> of your possession <WH3425>, and enjoy <WH3423> <WH8804> it, which Mosheh <WH4872> the YY'S <WH3068> servant <WH5650> gave <WH5414> <WH8804> you on this side <WH5676> Yarden <WH3383> toward the sunrising <WH4217> <WH8121>.

And they answered <WH6030> <WH8799> Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, All that thou commandest <WH6680> <WH8765> us we will do <WH6213> <WH8799>, and whithersoever <WH834> thou sendest <WH7971> <WH8799> us, we will go <WH3212> <WH8799>.

According as we hearkened <WH8085> <WH8804> unto Mosheh <WH4872> in all things, so will we hearken <WH8085> <WH8799> unto thee: only the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> be with thee, as he was with Mosheh <WH4872>.

Whosoever <WH376> he be that doth rebel <WH4784> <WH8686> against thy Mitzvah <WH6310>, and will not hearken <WH8085> <WH8799> unto thy words <WH1697> in all that thou commandest <WH6680> <WH8762> him, he shall be put to death <WH4191> <WH8714>: only be strong <WH2388> <WH8798> and of a good courage <WH553> <WH8798>.
